title: Enhancing Visual Literacy Through Infographic Creation and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course strengthening visual communication skills through infographic creation and evaluation in offline environments with provided digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can effectively integrate visual components (text, images, layout) by planning and producing infographics on social issues.
Learners can analyze peers' infographic works and suggest improvements by applying a modular assessment framework.
Learners can enhance the visual clarity and information delivery efficiency of infographics by 20% or more based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
